channel.title: A Bit Of Help, Experience Needed
channel.description:
Ok Hey Guys! :)
I've Been Working On A Devolution Server Source 7.0 For A Month And A BitIm Just Making The Finishing Touches. And I Was Wondering 2 Simple Things That Have Never Occured To Me Until Now. Although I Don't Really Need To Know There Things For What I'm Doing It Would Really Help If Ever Needed Later On.
1) How Do I Add Objects?
2) How Do I Give Item When Reach Level 99 In A Skill?
Since I Have No Experience In These Subjects Step By Step Instructions Will Be Needed As Of What To Search And Where To Add
In Addition I Was Also Wondering About A Reasonably Compilcated Subject.
3) Making Potions Work
Im More Worried About Questions One And Two But This Would Really Help. To Avoid Too Much Trouble I've Decided To Just Make It Give Permanent Xp For A Skill. This Is What I Have So Far:
case 2428: addSkillXP(800, 17); removeitem code (i dont know it...) Break;
All Help Would Be Appreciated On These Topics But Don't Answer If Your Too Busy
Thanx Guys.
Ps. Please Avoid Posting Useless Comments That Won't Help Me At All. :D

item.title: A Bit Of Help, Experience Needed
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Ok Hey Guys!

I’ve Been Working On A Devolution Server Source 7.0 For A Month And A BitIm Just Making The Finishing Touches. And I Was Wondering 2 Simple Things That Have Never Occured To Me Until Now. Although I Don’t Really Need To Know There Things For What I’m Doing It Would Really Help If Ever Needed Later On.

  1. How Do I Add Objects?

  2. How Do I Give Item When Reach Level 99 In A Skill?

Since I Have No Experience In These Subjects Step By Step Instructions Will Be Needed As Of What To Search And Where To Add

In Addition I Was Also Wondering About A Reasonably Compilcated Subject.

  1. Making Potions Work

Im More Worried About Questions One And Two But This Would Really Help. To Avoid Too Much Trouble I’ve Decided To Just Make It Give Permanent Xp For A Skill. This Is What I Have So Far:

case 2428:
addSkillXP(800, 17); removeitem code (i dont know it…)
Break;

All Help Would Be Appreciated On These Topics But Don’t Answer If Your Too Busy

Thanx Guys.

Ps. Please Avoid Posting Useless Comments That Won’t Help Me At All.

Read full topic
item.source: A Bit Of Help, Experience Needed
